train.title: MRT
train.description: Take line 2 to National Taiwan University Hospital Station and walk one block south to Sec 1, Renai Road (also called 3rd Blvd). This walk takes approximately five minutes.

bus.title: BUS
bus.description: To Renai-Zhongshan Intersection: Bus Nos. 37, 249, 261, 270, 621, 630, 651, Renai Line

footer: Angular Taiwan is an Angular community in Taiwan. We are welcome anyone to join us, and feel free to post and share any articles、courses、videos or any discussion that related to Angular.
